    the speaking of Lorna

    A desparate women seeks escape from her humdrum life with earth-shattering results
    A legal love story
    A young girl goes missing in the dusty Arizona desert
    Eva inherits millions from a mysterious benefactor but at what price?
    A great artist struggles in a miserabe marriage
    Great fun, an experimental sci-fi story in this nod to the wonder of physics and evloution
    A tale of male obsession
    An old Colonel consumed literally by his Garden
    Two nuns in war torn London try and make sense of their faith whilst above fate waits
    Nominated for the Pushcart Prize this is a powerful story of male grief
